title: Ana Disciple

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Generate (Green) each night.
- Generate Mana of a color of your choice at night. (1 use)
- (Blue): Target a player to allow them to bypass protective abilities tonight.
- (Black): Target a player to reduce their attack by 1 tier tonight.

desc:
Post 1900
*“The blessings of Gaea alone are no longer enough.”*
